info.title: Azure Location Based Services
info.description: Azure Location Based Services REST APIs

400.description: Bad request: one or more parameters were incorrectly specified or are mutually exclusive.

401.description: Unauthorized: Access is denied due to invalid credentials.

404.description: Not Found: the requested resource could not be found, but it may be available again in the future.

500.description: An error occurred while processing the request. Please try again later.

get.description: Returns the copyright information for a given bounding box

parameters.name: mincoordinates
parameters.description: Minimum coordinates of bounding box in latitude longitude coordinate system

parameters.name: maxcoordinates
parameters.description: Maximum coordinates of bounding box in latitude longitude coordinate system

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Boolean to exclude textual data from response

get.description: Returns the copyright caption information
Returns the copyright information for the world

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Boolean to exclude textual data from response

get.description: Returns the copyright information for a given tile

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Boolean to exclude textual data from response

get.description: Returns a raster map tile

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: Service type

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: WMS service version

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Request type

parameters.name: srs
parameters.description: Projection used in describing the bbox

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: Bounding box in the projection stated in srs.  In the stucture of 'minLon, minLat, maxLon, maxLat'

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Height of the resulting image, in pixels.  Maximum value is 2048.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Width of the resulting image, in pixels.   Maximum value is 2048.

parameters.name: layers
parameters.description: Map layer requested

parameters.name: styles
parameters.description: Map style to be returned

get.description: Returns a raster or vector map tile

parameters.name: layer
parameters.description: Map layer requested

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: Map style to be returned

parameters.name: tileSize
parameters.description: The size of the returned map tile

get.description: Returns the search results from a fuzzy search

parameters.name: typeahead
parameters.description: If the typeahead flag is set, the query will be interpreted as a partial input and the search will enter맗redictive맔ode

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of responses that will be returned

parameters.name: ofs
parameters.description: Starting offset of the returned results within the full result set

parameters.name: countrySet
parameters.description: Comma separated string of country codes

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude where results should be biased

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Longitude where results should be biased

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: If radius마nd맗osition are set, the results will be constrained to the defined area

parameters.name: topLeft
parameters.description: Top left position of the bounding box

parameters.name: btmRight
parameters.description: Bottom right position of the bounding box

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language in which search results should be returned

parameters.name: extendedPostalCodesFor
parameters.description: Indexes for which extended postal codes should be included in the results

parameters.name: minFuzzyLevel
parameters.description: Minimum fuzzyness level to be used

parameters.name: maxFuzzyLevel
parameters.description: Maximum fuzzyness level to be used

parameters.name: idxSet
parameters.description: A comma separated list of indexes which should be utilized for the search

parameters.description: Maximum number of responses that will be returned

parameters.name: ofs

get.description: Returns the search results from a Reverse address search

parameters.name: spatialKeys
parameters.description: If the spatialKeys flag is set, the response will also contain a proprietary geo-spatial key information for a specified location

parameters.name: returnSpeedLimit
parameters.description: To enable return of the posted speedlimit

parameters.name: heading
parameters.description: The directional heading of the vehicle in degrees, for travel along a segment of roadway

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The maximum distance in meters from the specified position for the reversegeocode to consider

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: If a number is sent in along with the request, the response may include the side of the street (Left/Right) and also an offset position for that number

parameters.name: returnRoadUse
parameters.description: To enable return of the road use array for reversegeocodes at street level

parameters.name: roadUse
parameters.description: To restrict reversegeocodes to a certain type of roaduse

get.description: Returns the search results from a Cross Street address search

parameters.name: spatialKeys
parameters.description: If the spatialKeys flag is set, the response will also contain a proprietary geo-spatial key information for a specified location

parameters.name: heading
parameters.description: The directional heading of the vehicle in degrees, for travel along a segment of roadway

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The maximum distance in meters from the specified position for the reversegeocode to consider

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language in which search results should be returned

get.description: Returns the search results from a Structured address search

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The country code portion of an address

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of responses that will be returned

parameters.name: ofs
parameters.description: Starting offset of the returned results within the full result set

parameters.name: streetNumber
parameters.description: The street number portion of an address

parameters.name: streetName
parameters.description: The street name portion of an address

parameters.name: crossStreet
parameters.description: The cross street name for the structured address

parameters.name: municipality
parameters.description: The municipality portion of an address

parameters.name: municipalitySubdivision
parameters.description: The municipality subdivision (sub/super city) for the structured address

parameters.name: countryTertiarySubdivision
parameters.description: The named area for the structured address

parameters.name: countrySecondarySubdivision
parameters.description: The county for the structured address

parameters.name: countrySubdivision
parameters.description: The country subdividion portion of an address

parameters.name: postalCode
parameters.description: The postal code portion of an address

parameters.name: extendedPostalCodesFor
parameters.description: Indexes for which extended postal codes should be included in the results

get.description: Returns routing directions between 2 coordinates

parameters.name: maxAlternatives
parameters.description: Number of desired alternative routes to be calculated

parameters.name: alternativeType
parameters.description: Controls the optimality, with respect to the given planning criteria

parameters.name: minDeviationDistance
parameters.description: All alternative routes returned will follow the reference route from the origin point of the calculateRoute request for at least this number of meters

parameters.name: minDeviationTime
parameters.description: All alternative routes returned will follow the reference route from the origin point of the calculateRoute request for at least this number of seconds

parameters.name: instructionsType
parameters.description: If specified, guidance instructions will be returned (if available).

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language parameter determines the language of the guidance messages

parameters.name: computeBestOrder
parameters.description: Re-order the route waypoints to reduce the route length. Yields best results when used in conjunction with routeType shortest

parameters.name: routeRepresentation
parameters.description: Specifies the representation of the set of routes provided as response

parameters.name: computeTravelTimeFor
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return additional travel times using different types of traffic information (none, historic, live) as well as the default best-estimate travel time

parameters.name: vehicleHeading
parameters.description: The directional heading of the vehicle in degrees starting at true North and continuing in clockwise direction

parameters.name: report
parameters.description: Specifies which data should be reported for diagnosis purposes

parameters.name: sectionType
parameters.description: Specifies which of the section types is reported in the route response

get.description: Returns the timezone info for an IANA ID
Returns the timezone info for a coordinates
Returns all the Windows timezones
Returns all the IANA timezones
Returns the current IANA version
Get the IANA timezone from a Windows timezone
Get the traffic flow tile for a given coordinates

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: Map style to be returned

parameters.name: thickness
parameters.description: The segment width multiplier

get.description: Get the traffic flow segment for a given coordinates

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: Map style to be returned

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: Unit of speed

parameters.name: thickness
parameters.description: Segment width multiplier

parameters.name: openLr
parameters.description: Whether the response should include OpenLR code

get.description: Get the traffic incident tile for a given coordinates

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: The style to be used to render the tile

parameters.name: t
parameters.description: Reference value for the state of traffic at a particular time, obtained from the Viewport API call

get.description: Get the traffic incident detail for a given coordinates

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: The style to be used to render the tile

parameters.name: boundingbox
parameters.description: The bounding box coordinates

parameters.name: boundingzoom
parameters.description: The zoom level of the bounding box

parameters.name: trafficmodelid
parameters.description: The traffic model id

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: ISO 639-1 code for the output language

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description: The projection used to specify the coordinates in the request and response

parameters.name: geometries
parameters.description: The type of vector geometry added to incidents

parameters.name: expandCluster
parameters.description: List all traffic incidents in a cluster separately

parameters.name: originalPosition
parameters.description:
Return the original position of the incident () as well as the one shifted to the beginning of the traffic tube (

)

get.description: Get the traffic incident viewport for a given boundingbox

parameters.name: boundingbox
parameters.description: The bounding box coordinates

parameters.name: boundingzoom
parameters.description: The zoom level of the bounding box

parameters.name: overviewbox
parameters.description: The overview box coordinates

parameters.name: overviewzoom
parameters.description: The zoom level of the overview box

parameters.name: copyright
parameters.description: The copyright boolean

Error.description: This object is returned when an error occurs in the Location Based Service API

message.description: If available, a human readable description of the error.

northEast.description: The North East coordinates for the Bounding Box

southWest.description: The South West coordinates for the Bounding Box

viewport.description: The viewport that covers the result

copyrightbounding200.description: This object is returned from a successful Copyright Bounding call

viewport.description: The viewport that covers the result
